121111.content: Nala always had pinned Simba while they played. He was hungry and he and Nala were away fromthe packed. They were wrestling againg and Simba finally pinned Nala. "You finally pinned me," said Nala, " can you get off me." Simba answer, "no. I am hungry and you are going to fill me up." Nala didn't have time to react. Next thing she knew was she was being shoved into her boyfriends mouth and down his throat into his stomach. Simba being small had a huge lump in his stomach which dragged along the ground. He couldnt go back yet because he probably be in trouble wth the pack. So he layed down onhis back rubbing his bloated belly

info.brief_description: you chose which chars of the lion king become prey or pred
info.description:
This a interactive for fans of the lion king and those who love vore, in this interactive you decide which of the main characters of the lion king well become the predator and the prey.

~*~*~ Rules ~*~*~

1. All characters must be non-anthro!!

2. Weight gain is allowed.

3. Scat is allowed.

4. Digestion is allowed
